author: Monique Valeris
title: Bestselling Sephora Lipsticks 2017 | POPSUGAR Beauty
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 13 of Sephora's Bestselling Lipsticks That You Need Now 
There's nothing more gratifying for a beauty enthusiast than poring over product reviews on Sephora's website. Thoughtful online feedback can persuade you to take a chance on a new product or even rediscover a gem that's been buried in your stash for far too long. 
For this reason, we decided to round up the best lipsticks according to Sephora reviewers. If you're in the market for a pretty Spring lipstick, keep reading to discover the formulas Sephora shoppers swear can make your pout the highlight of your next makeup haul. Related:
